title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{9x^{2\left(x^2-36\right)}}{\left(x^2+11x+30\right) 3x^2}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, 9 x raised to the 2 times, parentheses, x squared minus 36,  power over, parentheses, x squared plus 11 x plus 30  times 3 x squared,
pacedSpeech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get   fraction, 9 x raised to the 2 times, , x squared minus 36,  power over, , x squared plus 11 x plus 30  times 3 x squared,

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{9x^{2\left(x^2-36\right)}}{\left(x^2+11x+30\right) 3x^2}=\frac{9x^{2\left(x+6\right)} \left(x-6\right)}{\left(x+6\right) \left(x+5\right) 3x^2}=\frac{3\left(x-6\right)}{x+5}$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, 9 x raised to the 2 times, parentheses, x squared minus 36,  power over, parentheses, x squared plus 11 x plus 30  times 3 x squared,  is equal to fraction, 9 x raised to the 2 times, parentheses x plus 6,  power, parentheses x minus 6, , over, parentheses x plus 6,  times, parentheses x plus 5,  times 3 x squared,  is equal to fraction, 3 times, parentheses x minus 6, , over, x plus 5,
pacedSpeech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  this expression
